languages.text: "Два больших землетрясения в обоих полушариях, очень много жертв, много разрушений. Потом {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} что-то намудрили, что у нас подстанции стали взрываться по цепи, тоже люди гибли. И налоги новые поверх всего этого — губернатору надо было отчитаться его благородию Каллигосу, владыке нашему, о должном увеличении численности и оснащенности армии..." {n}Молодой человек замолкает, настороженно глядя на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Два больших землетрясения в обоих полушариях, очень много жертв, много разрушений. Потом {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} что-то намудрили, что у нас подстанции стали взрываться по цепи, тоже люди гибли. И налоги новые поверх всего этого — губернатору надо было отчитаться его благородию Каллигосу, владыке нашему, о должном увеличении численности и оснащенности армии..." {n}Молодой человек замолкает, настороженно глядя на вас.{/n}

languages.text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had lives lost to a series of substation explosions. Then, on top of all that, there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Два больших землетрясения в обоих полушариях, очень много жертв, много разрушений. Потом {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g} что-то намудрили, что у нас подстанции стали взрываться по цепи, тоже люди гибли. И налоги новые поверх всего этого — губернатору надо было отчитаться его благородию Каллигосу, владыке нашему, о должном увеличении численности и оснащенности армии..." {n}Молодой человек замолкает, настороженно глядя на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had a chain of substation explosions in which people got killed as well. Then on top of all that there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment stockplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment stockplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

languages.text: "Zwei große Erdbeben in beiden Hemisphären, die zahlreiche Opfer gefordert und schwere Schäden verursacht haben. Dann haben die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} an etwas herumgespielt, was sie lieber nicht hätten anrühren sollen, und eine ganze Reihe von Umspannwerken ist explodiert, wobei es viele Tote gab. Und dann wurden zu allem Überfluss auch noch neue Steuern eingeführt. Der Gouverneur musste seiner Lordschaft Calligos berichten können, dass die Armee wie geplant mehr Personal und mehr Ausrüstung bekommt ..." {n}Der junge Mann verstummt und blickt dich nervös an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had lives lost to a series of substation explosions. Then, on top of all that, there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zwei große Erdbeben in beiden Hemisphären, die zahlreiche Opfer gefordert und schwere Schäden verursacht haben. Dann haben die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} an etwas herumgespielt, was sie lieber nicht hätten anrühren sollen, und eine ganze Reihe von Umspannwerken ist explodiert, wobei es viele Tote gab. Und dann wurden zu allem Überfluss auch noch neue Steuern eingeführt. Der Gouverneur musste seiner Lordschaft Calligos berichten können, dass die Armee wie geplant mehr Personal und mehr Ausrüstung bekommt ..." {n}Der junge Mann verstummt und blickt dich nervös an.{/n}

languages.text: « Deux séismes majeurs ont touché les deux hémisphères, en faisant beaucoup de dégâts et de morts. Après ça, les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} ont joué avec quelque chose qu'ils n'auraient pas dû toucher, et des gens ont péri dans des explosions en chaîne de sous-stations. Et pour couronner le tout, il y a eu les nouveaux impôts. Le gouverneur devait pouvoir indiquer à Sa Seigneurie Calligos que le nombre de soldats et l'approvisionnement en équipement avaient augmenté comme prévu... » {n}Le jeune homme se tait et vous regarde avec appréhension.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had lives lost to a series of substation explosions. Then, on top of all that, there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Deux séismes majeurs ont touché les deux hémisphères, en faisant beaucoup de dégâts et de morts. Après ça, les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} ont joué avec quelque chose qu'ils n'auraient pas dû toucher, et des gens ont péri dans des explosions en chaîne de sous-stations. Et pour couronner le tout, il y a eu les nouveaux impôts. Le gouverneur devait pouvoir indiquer à Sa Seigneurie Calligos que le nombre de soldats et l'approvisionnement en équipement avaient augmenté comme prévu... » {n}Le jeune homme se tait et vous regarde avec appréhension.{/n}

languages.text: “南北半球发生了两次大地震，造成了大量人员伤亡和损失。在那之后，{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}又瞎摆弄他们不该摆弄的东西，导致配电站发生了一连串爆炸，又害死了很多人。除此之外，还添加了新的税收项目，因为总督需要向卡里戈斯大人报告，说军队的人数与装备供应已经按照计划改进……”{n}年轻人停了下来，忧虑地看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had lives lost to a series of substation explosions. Then, on top of all that, there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “南北半球发生了两次大地震，造成了大量人员伤亡和损失。在那之后，{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}又瞎摆弄他们不该摆弄的东西，导致配电站发生了连环爆炸，又害死了很多人。除此之外，还添加了新的税收项目，因为总督需要向卡里戈斯大人报告，说军队的人数与装备供应已经按照计划改进……”{n}年轻人停了下来，忧虑地看着你。{/n}

languages.text: 「両半球で二つの大地震が発生し、多くの死傷者と破壊が発生しました。その後、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}たちが触れてはいけないものをいじって、変電所の連鎖的な爆発で命が失われた。その上、新しい税金まで適用された。総督はカリゴス卿に計画通りに軍の数と装備供給が増えたことを報告する必要があった…」{n}若者は黙り込み、不安そうにあなたを見つめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had lives lost to a series of substation explosions. Then, on top of all that, there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「両半球で二つの大地震が発生し、多くの死傷者と破壊が発生しました。その後、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}たちが触れてはいけないものをいじって、変電所の連鎖的な爆発で命が失われた。その上、新しい税金まで適用された。知事はカリゴス卿に計画通りに軍の数と装備供給が増えたことを報告する必要があった…」{n}若者は黙り込み、不安そうにあなたを見つめた。{/n}

languages.text: «Dos grandes terremotos en ambos hemisferios, con muchas víctimas y destrucción. Entonces los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} tocaron algo que no debían, y perdimos muchas vidas en una serie de explosiones de las subestaciones. A todo esto hay que añadir los nuevos impuestos. El gobernador necesitaba poder informar a milord Calligos de que los efectivos del ejército y los suministros de equipo habían aumentado según lo previsto...». {n}El joven se calla y te mira con aprensión.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had lives lost to a series of substation explosions. Then, on top of all that, there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Dos grandes terremotos en ambos hemisferios, con muchas víctimas y destrucción. Entonces los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tecnosacerdotes{/g} tocaron algo que no debían, y perdimos muchas vidas en una cadena de explosiones de las subestaciones. A todo esto hay que añadir los nuevos impuestos. El gobernador necesitaba poder informar a milord Calligos de que los efectivos del ejército y los suministros de equipo habían aumentado según lo previsto...» {n}El joven se calla y te mira con aprensión.{/n}

languages.text: "Her iki yarım kürede de çok sayıda can kaybı ve yıkıma sebep olan iki büyük deprem gerçekleşti. Sonra {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g} ellememeleri gereken bir şeyi kurcaladılar ve trafo merkezindeki bir dizi patlamayla daha da çok kişi öldü. Bir de bunların üstüne yeni vergiler geldi. Valinin, Lord Calligos Hazretleri'ne vereceği raporda ordu mevcudunun ve teçhizat miktarının planlandığı gibi arttığını göstermesi gerekiyordu..." {n}Genç adam sessizleşiyor ve kaygıyla sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Two major earthquakes in both hemispheres, with lots of casualties and destruction. Then the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} tinkered with something they shouldn't have, and we had lives lost to a series of substation explosions. Then, on top of all that, there were the new taxes. The governor needed to be able to report to His Lordship Calligos that the army's numbers and equipment supplies had increased as planned..." {n}The young man falls silent and looks at you with apprehension.{/n}

Bir de bunların üstüne yeni vergiler geldi. Valinin, Lord Hazretleri Calligos'a vereceği raporda ordu mevcudunun ve teçhizat miktarının planlandığı gibi arttığını göstermesi gerekiyordu..." {n}Genç adam sessizleşiyor ve kaygıyla sana bakıyor.{/n}
